sn32.57:1.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn32.57:1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yenekadā devo vassatī”ti?
sn32.57:1.6: ‘yannūna mayaṁ sakāya ratiyā vaseyyāmā’ti, tesaṁ taṁ cetopaṇidhimanvāya devo vassati.
sn32.57:1.7: Ayaṁ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṁ paccayo, yenekadā devo vassatī”ti.
